titles.title: A resolution affirming the importance of the long-term solvency of the Highway Trust Fund.
A resolution affirming the importance of the long-term solvency of the Highway Trust Fund.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that (1) the Highway Trust Fund should achieve long-term solvency through user fees, and (2) any spending on federal highway programs during the next reauthorization period that exceeds current fund revenues and balances should be fully offset.
